unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhaka hea mhoineachem electricity bill shock diun ghelem! Poilea mhoineak, tem sumar ₹2500 aslem, punn hea pavtim tem ₹4875 zalam. Mhaka kollona tem itlem koxem vaddle mhonn. Zaite pavtim Delhi-nt zallelea unhan lagun hanvem AC chodd vaprunk astolo, vo paka 15/07-cher meter reading chukichem asunk xakta. BSES-ak call korun complaint korunk zai; hem bekar asaa. Consumption 550 units dakhoitale, jem fokot eka mhoinea khatir bhov unch dista. Mhojea xezareachem bill, ekach toxench flat-an jiyeta, fokot 3000 Rs aslem. Kaim tori gongo ghotalo asa!
normalised: Arre yaar, mhojem current bill hea mhoinyant chokanchem aslem! Fattim mhoinyant, te don hazar panchso rupea aslem, punn hea pavtim char hazar athso ani sattor rupea asa. Maka kollona te koxem itlem vaddlem mhunn. Zaunk xokta Delhi-ant ushnek lagun hanvem A-C chodd vapralem dekhun, vo pondhra july-ar meter vachop chukichem aslem. B-S-E-S-ak phone korun takrar korunk zai; hem bekaar asa. Vaprop panchso ani ponnas units dakhoita, jem ekach mhoinyak lagun khub chodd dista. Mhojea gharant ravnarechea bill, toxim gharam asun legit, fokot tin hazar rupea aslem. Kaim tori gorbar asa!
text: Arre yaar, mhaka hea mhoineachem electricity bill shock diun ghelem! Poilea mhoineak, tem sumar ₹2500 aslem, punn hea pavtim tem ₹4875 zalam. Mhaka kollona tem itlem koxem vaddle mhonn. Zaite pavtim Delhi-nt zallelea unhan lagun hanvem AC chodd vaprunk astolo, vo paka 15/07-cher meter reading chukichem asunk xakta. BSES-ak call korun complaint korunk zai; hem bekar asaa. Consumption 550 units dakhoitale, jem fokot eka mhoinea khatir bhov unch dista. Mhojea xezareachem bill, ekach toxench flat-an jiyeta, fokot 3000 Rs aslem. Kaim tori gongo ghotalo asa!
